newsitem.title: UK: Barlows to take over Rowlinson.
newsitem.headline: Barlows to take over Rowlinson.

text.p: British property investment and development group Barlows Plc said on Friday it had made a recommended offer for real estate group Rowlinson Securities Plc.
Barlows said it had made a share offer valuing Rowlinson at around 46.37 million stg or a cash alternative at 320p per Rowlinson share which valued the company at around 39.97 million.
Barlows said it already had irrevocable acceptances for more than 90 percent of Rowlinson's share capital.
Under the terms of the share offer, Rowlinson shareholders will receive 11 new Barlows shares for every two Rowlinson shares held.
Barlows said it also planned to raise up to 5.58 million stg before expenses in a two for five rights issue at 52.5p per share.
